dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Oh my, good morning. I was so deep asleep I didn't see you coming.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: You don't look like other stuff around here.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: What are you?

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: You are not like the others. You talk.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Who are you?

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Well, I'm a little 'magical', you see.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Me? Oh, no one. I am just a creature.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Sometimes I am here. Sometimes I am there...

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Anywho. Greetings little hero.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Hope you don’t mind me not stretching your hand.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Are you by any chance what they call a 'Siffler'?

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Yes, I believe I am.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: My memories though, are a bit fuzzy...

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: I... don't know.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: I'm quite confused. This island, these creatures. I can't even remember what I am

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Fascinating, the dark forces that run savages on this island could not get ahold of you.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Truly fascinating.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Oh, but you are a Siffler.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: I was not sure about the “other ones”, but you.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: You are one of them, just not like those ones...

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Thankfully I know a tad of Siflet from my journeys, what a beautifully witty language you people invented.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Anywho. I’ve been wandering this woods looking for its secrets.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: I feel something hiding not very far from here, I can hear its whistle.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: And this, a stone from the heavens, has fallen into my arms.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: On my hat, to be precise, heh.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: It hides a purpose so great I cannot begin to fathom it, I am sure of it.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Wait, it is calling...

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Calling for you.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Mmmm. Very well, I'll pass this talisman onto you.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: But only if you assist me first.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: You see, I am lacking those so-called arms, so it is a hard task for me to recollect what I am seeking.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Luckily, you possess not only one but two of them.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: How good for me.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Will you help me then, hero?

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Of course. I'll do whathever I can to help.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Yes... I suppose. But I don't really know y-

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Wonderful!

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Anywho, listen closely...

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Bring me HER, who grows and feeds from the path to the castle.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: HIM, who used to fly, hides cowardly from the glowing sun near the statue of your people.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: And IT, a piece of the sky, broken next to some rocks.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Come back to me when you find them. I’ll be waiting.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Could you repeat the riddles? I don't think I got them.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Got it. But one last thing.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Could I know your name before I go?

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: My name you ask? A truly wise question.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Sadly I have no answer.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: But you can call me Sorcerer, if that suffices, heh.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Now, good luck, little hero!
dialogues.alternative_text: Still waiting, and so are they. Go on, hero.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Welcome back hero.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: You have reunited the triplets? How wonderful, let me see.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Back together and back with me, as always.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: I suppose this belongs to you now.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: 'YOU RECEIVED THE ARTIFACT'

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Must be sad seeing your people turn into those malicious entities.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: But do not lose hope, hero, what you need to save them it's hidden somewhere in these woods.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: You just have to let it find you.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Oh silly me, I almost forgot.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: May I ask, perhaps, the hero’s name?

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: I think I remember. It was something like...

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: UASU

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: I'm sorry. I don't remember.

dialogues.speaker: uasu
dialogues.text: Something in this island...

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: UASU?

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: ... Of course. Of course it’s you.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Farwell, UASU.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Misterious, I understand.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: Goodbye then, and good luck little bird.

dialogues.speaker: sorcerer
dialogues.text: I’ll stay here, do not fret. I am always here, heh.
